name: Hiver
trial: 7-day free trial with no credit card required

pricing.name: Free
pricing.comment: Free forever, includes multi-channel shared inboxes, ticketing, live chat, WhatsApp & voice, knowledge base, team collaboration, Slack integration, and 24/7 support.

pricing.name: Lite
pricing.comment: Everything in Free plan plus customer portal, workflow automations, round-robin auto-assignment, service level agreements, custom fields, analytics for conversation data, and essential integrations.

pricing.name: Growth
pricing.comment: Everything in Lite plan plus analytics for team performance, custom reports, and advanced integrations.

pricing.name: Pro
pricing.comment: Everything in Growth plan plus chatbots, CSAT survey, business hours, Harvey AI, advanced analytics, scheduled data exports, and premium integrations.

pricing.name: Elite
pricing.comment: Everything in Pro plan plus skill-based routing, custom roles, HIPAA compliance, single sign-on, additional success services, and custom build hours.

features.name: Omnichannel Shared Inbox
features.description: Integrates email, live chat, WhatsApp, and voice communications into a single inbox.

features.name: Live Chat with AI
features.description: Provides instant resolutions through AI-driven chatbots.

features.name: Customer Portal
features.description: Enables customers to submit and track issues.

features.name: Knowledge Base
features.description: Allows customers to find answers independently.

support: Excellent customer support with responsive and helpful team.
scalability: Scalable for teams of various sizes, from small businesses to large enterprises.
customization: Offers customization options such as custom fields, roles, and reports.

reviews_pros.description: Ease of Use: Intuitive and easy to set up.
Team Collaboration: Enhances collaboration among team members.
Integration with Gmail: Seamless integration with Gmail.
Automation Features: Includes automation tools to improve efficiency.

reviews_cons.description: Cost: Considered expensive by some users.
Technical Issues: Occasional technical glitches reported.
Limited Features: Desire for additional functionalities.
Pricing Model Concerns: Frustration over price increases and changes.
